params.html: Not rendering correctly? View this email as a web page here.

January 16 - 17, 2019 | Omaha, Nebraska

www.thelightingsummit.com

img.alt: Residential Outdoor Security Lighting Omaha Nebraska McKay Landscape Lighting V 01

params.html:
Good morning, {{ contact.firstname }}!

You know The Lighting Summit is a great chance to escape the office, set aside dedicated time to focus on how you can improve your business, and gain new ideas that can be implemented upon returning home.

Need more reasons to attend? Here are the top reasons (in no particular order):

Network with Your Peers

Join leading business owners from all over the country. Make meaningful connections with like-minded peers who share the same challenges and create life-long friendships.

"A great like-minded bunch, just what I need to get excited for the upcoming business year." 

Read more»

Exclusivity

Registration is limited to one business per metropolitan area, so you won't find your competitor at The Lighting Summit.

Sharing & Collaborating

With no competitors in the room, you and your peers, a community of incredibly smart business owners, can openly discuss what you're currently doing, share ideas, experiences, and focus on improving your business in a non-competitive environment.

Content-Focused Agenda

Two full days of topics geared entirely on growing and improving your landscape lighting business. Compelling sessions that range from inspiring keynotes to practical group discussions. Walk away with actionable ideas and strategies to elevate your business.

img.alt: Professional Outdoor Lighting Company Omaha Nebraska  McKay Landscape Lighting MHQ 01

params.html:
McKay's Team

Meet and talk with our team to learn more about their role within the company. If your next move involves hiring someone to manage the office, sales, crews, finance, or marketing - they're a great resource.

"The interaction between attendees is always fantastic and talking with Jerry and his team provides information on how to run a successful outdoor lighting business."

Read more»

No Sales Pitches

Just learning and collaborating.

img.alt: Reserve Your Spot for The Lighting Summit Now!

params.html:
JOIN US AT THE LIGHTING SUMMIT

January 16-17, 2019

Reserve your spot now and we'll send you everything to pay for your registration, travel, and hotel. Join us for the jam-packed two-day event.
